buildings.name: Headquarters
buildings.desc: The headquarters coordinates the development and construction speed of your empire. The higher the level of the office, the quicker the other buildings are developed.

buildings.name: Training Facility
buildings.desc: Here you can build units to attack your opponents. The time in which each unit will be completed will depend on the type the unit and the level of the facility.

buildings.name: Operation Center
buildings.desc: This building increases the efficiency of your empire and permits you to get a bonus on all your of income.

buildings.name: Pantheon
buildings.desc: The Pantheon does not have any particular function, and shows a sign of wealth, striking jealousy in your opponents.

buildings.name: Research Center
buildings.desc: The Research Center allows the training of your units in new techniques, giving them more expertise in combat. As with the HQ, higher is the level, faster the skills are developed.

buildings.name: Crack House
buildings.desc: A crack house where your drug dealers produce DRUGS... slowly but surely

buildings.name: Hydroponic Farm
buildings.desc: A good solution for producing more DRUGS without soil is to use the Hydroculture.

buildings.name: Meth Lab
buildings.desc: This building contain drug experts which produce DRUGS with a comfortable speed.

buildings.name: Cocina
buildings.desc: We call it 'LaCocina' or 'LaCuisine', it produce more DRUGS with a better speed.

buildings.name: Pharmaceutical Lab
buildings.desc: Here you go if you want to produce DRUGS massively to take over the DrugWars.

buildings.name: Drug Storage
buildings.desc: This building help you to stock more DRUGS and keep them safe from ennemies. Base 10% + 1% for each level

buildings.name: Ammunition Factory
buildings.desc: This is your first building to produce WEAPONS.

buildings.name: Weapon Factory
buildings.desc: Want to produce more WEAPONS? The solution may be the weapon factory

buildings.name: Smuggle
buildings.desc: Smuggling can be worth and it produce more WEAPONS.

buildings.name: Black Market
buildings.desc: The black market is the good place to trade weapons, it produce WEAPONS.

buildings.name: 3D Metal printing
buildings.desc: This is the ultimate way to produce WEAPONS fastly.

buildings.name: Weapon Storage
buildings.desc: This building help you to stock more WEAPONS and keep them safe from ennemies. Base 10% + 1% for each level

buildings.name: Cameras
buildings.desc: More you have cameras and more you can spy on your neighboor to caught any suspect move.

buildings.name: Dogs
buildings.desc: They will scare your opponents!

buildings.name: Defense Troops
buildings.desc: A good defense which consist to have strong defenders.

buildings.name: Security System
buildings.desc: This is a sophisticated system to defend yourself

buildings.name: Hidden Mines
buildings.desc: Put some mines around your base and suprise your opponents!

buildings.name: Routing
buildings.desc: This increase the speed of your units!

buildings.name: Coordination
buildings.desc: By working together your units tend to keep their role as core!

buildings.name: Close Combat
buildings.desc: Improve the efficience of your Melee units!

buildings.name: Firearms Training
buildings.desc: Improve the efficience of your Short Range units!

buildings.name: Information Procurement
buildings.desc: Improve the efficience of your attacks and give your more options!

buildings.name: Sniper Trains
buildings.desc: Improve the efficience of your Long Range units!

buildings.name: Bomb Construction
buildings.desc: Improve the attack of your Bombers!

buildings.name: Psychological Training
buildings.desc: Improve the defense of all your Mercenaries!

buildings.name: Chemical Training
buildings.desc: Improve the efficience of your Chemical Troups!

units.name: Super Bouncer
units.desc: He's not smart but will follow you untill he dies.

units.name: Knifer
units.desc: He does not look dangerous... at the first sight.

units.name: Gunman
units.desc: He's armed and ready to shot.

units.name: Bomber
units.desc: We call him 'Bomber' because he allways have a small bomb on him'

units.name: Sniper
units.desc: The Sniper has a low cost and provide a long range.

units.name: Hitman
units.desc: It's name isnt enought? He just do the job!

units.name: Chemical Troup
units.desc: Chemical troups are slower than bombers, but also more efficient

units.name: Commander
units.desc: When Commanders attack, nobody stay stoic.

units.name: Big Mama
units.desc: Big Mama has a Big defense

units.name: Bazooka Guy
units.desc: He own a bazooka! Be carefull with him

units.name: BlackWidow
units.desc: Slower than the ninja but more powerfull

units.name: Tactical Expert
units.desc: This unit provide some boost to all your units

characters.name: Jacob
characters.story: Jacob is a sweet man from London who can only speak when facing north. He always wears a blue shirt. His biggest fear is getting bitten by an alligator. He must use his talent for campaigning to heal the people around him before he can work on his own problems.

characters.name: Tony
characters.story: Tony is a 39-year-old personal trainer who enjoys watching television, meditation and playing card games. He is inspiring and giving, but can also be very cowardly and a bit untrustworthy. He is Puerto Rican who defines himself as bisexual. He finished school and then left academia. He has a severe phobia of bridges

characters.name: Alison
characters.story: Alison is a 45-year-old sales assistant at office supplies store who enjoys meditation, attending museums and theatre. She is bright and exciting, but can also be very cowardly and a bit selfish. She is a Solomon Islander Christian who defines herself as straight. She finished school and then left academia. She is obsessed with Frozen.

characters.name: Nagami
characters.story: A mystical Ninja from nowhere is obsessed with films. Physically, he is built like a flagpole. He always carries a calculator. He is particularly interested in learning new words in French.

characters.name: Katia
characters.story: A 26-year-old swimming instructor is traumatised by the loss of her partner when she was six. Physically, she is built like a space hopper. She strongly dislikes her neighbour. She is hiding a terrible secret concerning a hippo.

characters.name: Reuter
characters.story: A 58-year-old father is traumatised by the loss of his mother when he was four. He usually wears a grey dress. He always carries a green cape. He is striving to redeem himself after pushing a homeless person off a cliff.

characters.name: Brad
characters.story: Brad Malkovich is a 22-year-old junior manager who enjoys vandalising bus stops, escapology and repressing minorities. He is stable and bright, but can also be very sneaky and a bit standoffish. He is an American Christian who defines himself as gay. He finished school and then left academia.

characters.name: André
characters.story: André is a chatty French student who is addicted to cooking & selfies. People often compare him to a chatty horse. His biggest fear is losing his sight. He must use his talent for dating to heal the people around him before he can work on his own problems.

characters.name: Fred
characters.story: Fred Barker is a 21-year-old sous chef who enjoys Star Wars, social card games, ferret racing and drone photography. He is loveable and entertaining, but can also be very boring and a bit unkind. He is British who defines himself as gay. He finished school and then left academia.

characters.name: Glenda
characters.story: Glenda is a reckless nurse who finds it hard to stay out of trouble. She looks surprisingly calm. She strongly dislikes her daughter. On Thursdays, she likes to kill bad guys.

characters.name: Reece
characters.story: A 56-year-old engineer is angry about politics. He has a nose like a beak. He strongly dislikes his daughter. His purpose in life is to become a senior monarch.

characters.name: David
characters.story: David Bond is a 45-year-old personal trainer who enjoys escapology, watching television and bowling. He is friendly and exciting, but can also be very dull and a bit evil. He is American who defines himself as straight. He started studying sports science at college but never finished the course.

characters.name: Paula
characters.story: An unlucky woman from Norway is obsessed with zombies. She usually wears a shoulder-parrot. Her biggest fear is getting bitten by a tiger. She is striving to redeem herself after saying a rude word on local radio.

characters.name: Ned
characters.story: Ned is a passionate builder who is addicted to Melbourne. He has eyes like little planets. His biggest fear is being killed by a lion. His purpose in life is to find a soulmate.

characters.name: Petra
characters.story: Petra is a shy werewolf who finds it hard to get out of bed in the mornings. She looks young for her age. Her biggest fear is turning to the dark side. She must use her talent for poetry to heal the people around her before she can work on her own problems.

characters.name: Bowzo
characters.story: An invisible clown from another galaxy, he is obsessed with computers and hentai. Physically, he is built like a clown. His biggest fear is his friends discovering that he can't make any joke or prank. On Fridays, he likes to go to the zoo.
